job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a researchoriented engineer to design develop and test algorithms and architectures for unstructured information retrieval and classification As a fulltime engineer you will take ownership of research and development of various algorithms for information extraction language understanding and image processing You will also be involved in writing scripts for web crawling data cleansing and model validationppbrppstrongPreferred Educational QualificationsstrongpulliBTechMTech with relevant projectsliulpbrppstrongRequired SkillsstrongpulliCCPythonliliTensorflowPyTorchliliOpenCV or similar toolkitsliliExposure to NLP in a professional environmentliliStrong theoretical understanding of probability theory and machine learningliliStrong understanding of data structures and algorithmsliulpbrppstrongDesired SkillsstrongpulliBuilding web applications and creating REST APIsliliDatabases  SQL or NoSQLliulpbrppIf youre datadriven and are looking to work on cuttingedge research and development apply right awayp
